attributes.action: remove the migrants in the uk within the next 2 years commencing 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we the undersigned petition the prime minister to use the tactics below to remove the migrants from the United Kingdom.

1] Any migrant charged with commiting an offence against the Law of the UK are to be ejected to their individual countries for punishment.

2] No migrant is to claim any UK benefits including housing benefit within the first 9 months of them arriving to the country.

3] A higher rate of income TAX to be deducted from any pay recieved (30%)

4] Migrants married to UK citizens are no exeption.

This is not RACISM its OUR RIGHTS

Lets turn the United Kingdom back into Great Britain!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
